thread.title: Small room - big welcome
thread.title_full: Small room - big welcome - Review of The Z Hotel Piccadilly, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: halomonas
title: Small room - big welcome
text:
Small room - we knew that beforehand - but they were spotlessly clean and everything, including the Cinemascope-sized TV worked. And, we had a view - Nelson atop his column and the stately progression of the London Eye.
The nest-like feel of the room was more than compensated by:
1. The location could hardly be more convenient - a stone's throw from Piccadilly and not much further to Trafalgar Square. And yet, remarkably, there was very little noise of traffic or of late-night roisterers.
2. The staff were young, friendly and efficient, dealing expertly with us and other guests.
3. The offer of wine and cheese "on the house" is a nice touch and lent an air of a Mediterranean Bistro to the cosy little Reception- cum-dining area.
Room Tip: Try for an upper floor See more room tips
